sentences.en: A heifer bellowed in her stall.
Egypt a beautiful heifer, but a gadfly is coming against her from the north.
sentences.cn: 埃及是肥美的母牛犊.但出于北方的毁灭(作牛虻)到了. 来到了.

sentences.en: Egypt is a beautiful heifer, but a gadfly is coming against her from the north.
sentences.cn: 20埃及是肥美的母牛犊.但出于北方的毁灭〔毁灭或作牛虻来到了、来到了.

sentences.en: Egypt is a beautiful heifer; A gadfly from the north has come on her.
sentences.cn: 20埃及是肥美的母牛犊; 但出于北方的牛来到她身上了.

sentences.en: Egypt is like a very fair heifer, but destruction cometh ; it cometh out of the north.
sentences.cn: 埃及是肥美的母牛犊.但出于北方的毁灭(或作牛虻)来到了.来到了.

sentences.en: HEIFER saw an Ox hard at work harnessed to a plow.
sentences.cn: 小母牛看到公牛套着工具辛苦的犁地.

sentences.en: Heifer's approach is to provide families with livestock that can be bred for food.
sentences.cn: 小母牛采取的是向家庭提供家畜,让人们通过饲养家畜获得食物的方法.

sentences.en: Sound meat there like a stallfed heifer.
sentences.cn: 这肉多么新鲜啊,像是圈里养的小母牛犊.

sentences.en: The goddess delivered the heifer to Argus, to be strictly watched.
sentences.cn: 那女神就把这头小母牛交给阿尔戈斯严加看管.

sentences.en: The heifer is only six months old.
sentences.cn: 这只小母牛只有六个月大.

sentences.en: The white heifer is big with calf.
sentences.cn: 那头白色的小母牛快下崽了.

sentences.en: The winners are David Beckmann of Bread for the World and Jo Luck of Heifer International.
sentences.cn: 他们分别是来自世界面包组织的大卫·伯克曼和国际小母牛中心的乔·拉克.

sentences.en: They black heifer chalk , said ,'she is white , Bos cretatus. "
sentences.cn: 他们替一头小黑牛抹上石膏粉, 便说: “ 你已经白了. ”

sentences.en: When we first meet Sylvester Stallone in that film, he frankly looks like a skinned heifer that someone left out in the rain for six weeks.
sentences.cn: 影片开头，我们看看西尔维斯特·史泰龙，简直就象一头被扒了皮的小母牛，而且，还被人扔在雨里，放了六星期。

sentences.en: While he watches , the heifer is to be burned - its hide, flesh, blood and offal.
sentences.cn: 人要在他眼前把这母牛焚烧.牛的皮, 肉, 血,粪都要焚烧.

trans.tran_en: a young cow that has not yet given birth to a  calf
